Text: For some reason refuses to work on my ipod, works fine in itunes though :

@AArelig @IKnowWhatImHereFor
My iPod has the same issue with this album BUT I downloaded it from somewhere else. Only came here to see if there was a version of the mp3's that worked =/
If you have iTunes set to convert songs to 256 aac when you sync your ipod it will work just fine.
My computer does not play this, the music player crashes at all songs.

320kbps isnt CD quality....1411kbps is CD quality not that you can really tell the difference between them when your listening.  Quality isnt the best but it works for now...they almost sound like youtube rips.  That might explain why people are having trouble playing these songs since they are fake 320kbps.
